trans-unit.source: The dataset contains information about movies that were rated in Twitter tweets: IMDB movie ID, movie name and genre, production year.
trans-unit.target: The dataset contains information about movies that were rated in Twitter tweets: IMDB movie ID, movie name and genre, production year.

trans-unit.source: There are 17K movies in the dataset.
trans-unit.target: There are 17K movies in the dataset.

trans-unit.source: The dataset was introduced in the paper "S.
trans-unit.target: The dataset was introduced in the paper "S.

trans-unit.source: Dooms, T. De Pessemier and L. Martens.
trans-unit.target: Dooms, T. De Pessemier and L. Martens.

trans-unit.source: MovieTweetings: a Movie Rating Dataset Collected From Twitter.
trans-unit.target: MovieTweetings: a Movie Rating Dataset Collected From Twitter.

trans-unit.source: Workshop on Crowdsourcing and Human Computation for Recommender Systems, CrowdRec at RecSys 2013."
trans-unit.target: Workshop on Crowdsourcing and Human Computation for Recommender Systems, CrowdRec at RecSys 2013."
